settings.popup_main_info:
Please use this size charts to help determine your size. Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use the charts as a general guide to compare the various size scales.
If you have a specific sizing question or would like more information, please contact us
Sizes listed are US, unless otherwise noted.
settings.howtomeasure_details: For bust size, measure around your chest at the fullest point of your breast.
settings.measurewaist_details: Measure around your natural waist (the smallest part of your waistline) with one finger between your body and the measuring tape.
settings.measurehip_details: Measure around the fullest part of your hip, making sure to keep the tape straight.

settings.seo-copy-text: Marika is an active lifestyle brand for the gym and beyond. We've got you covered no matter what the day holds. Find your perfect fit with everyday essentials like bum-sculpting leggings, comfortable wear-anywhere pullovers and yoga mats that support your best sun salutation.

settings.promo_details_text:
*3 for $39 on Select Leggings when purchased from https://www.marika.com/collections/3-for-39-leggings.
Offer expires 1/4/2023 at 11:59pm PT. No promo code needed. Discount automatically applies in cart at checkout. Offer not valid on previous purchases and cannot be used with any other offer. Applying a promo code to
your cart will cancel the 3 for $39 on select styles promo. Offer only available while supplies last. All purchases are final sale. Select styles are $13.00 when you buy 3 and must be purchased in quantities of 3 to receive
discount. Offer may not be applied to gift cards or shipping cost. Details of offer are subject to change.

 

Free Standard Shipping: Offer applies to standard, ground shipping within the contiguous US states. No minimum required. If you choose another shipping option, additional charges will apply. Free Shipping does not include delivery confirmation and insurance. No adjustments on previous purchases. Offer is non-transferable and subject to change without notice.

settings.title: Vue.ai Top Picks For You + Inspired by browsing history

settings.taxes_text: *U.S. orders only, International shipping rates apply. Taxes will be calculated at checkout.
